li.label: bestial
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has turned into a bestial snout, like that of a great canine. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is much more difficult, but eating is easier. Many people find [PAWN_possessive] snout intimidating.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s face seems to be swelling, the nose and jaw pressing out and looking decidedly more like an animal's.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a great canine. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult, but eating is easier.

li.label: adapted
li.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a great canine. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult, but eating is easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with talking.

li.label: paragon
li.description: An imposing snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a great canine. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, so eating is easier. Animals seem to find [PAWN_possessive] intimidating and are less likely to disobey [PAWN_possessive].

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: lupine
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The fuzzy pointy ear of a wolf.

li.description: Two pointed and furred ears crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, as they flick left and right, listening for the sounds of prey.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: wolfish tail
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A grey wolf-like tail hangs from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine, alert and waiting for a hunt.
